CWEs: CWE-311: Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data
CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
description: The function decodeToken is vulnerable as it does not encrypt sensitive data (the token). It also uses insufficiently random values for the initialization vector (iv), which can lead to predictability in the encryption process. Furthermore, the function exposes sensitive information through error messages, which can be exploited by an attacker to gain more information about the system.
